title: 3D Print your own mini battlebot! (FULL tutorial FREE .stl download)

media:group.media:title: 3D Print your own mini battlebot! (FULL tutorial FREE .stl download)
media:group.media:description:
Learn how to design, print and build your very own combat robot (battlebot)!

In this detailed tutorial you'll learn how to create an antweight (150g) controlled fighting machine using low cost parts and a 3D Printer! 

You can use this tutorial to create almost any remote controlled robot platform of any size. If you create something, please let me know!!!

.STL and .STEP downloads - https://www.makersmuse.com/3d-printed-antweight-v1

Learning Resources:
Robowars Adelaide event - https://www.sciencealive.net.au/
Lipo battery disposal - https://hobbyking.com/en_us/blog/lipo-battery-disposal-for-beginners/
LED resistor calculator - https://www.allaboutcircuits.com/tools/led-resistor-calculator/

Part Resources (FEEL FREE TO USE YOUR OWN - MAY BECOME UNAVAILABLE) 
Gearmotors - https://www.ebay.com.au/itm/192569276688
Battery - https://hobbyking.com/en_us/turnigy-nano-tech-300mah-2s-35-70c-lipo-pack.html
Flipsky dual ESC (DOES NOT HAVE MOTOR BRAKE) - https://flipsky.net/collections/electronic-products/products/brushed-esc-dual-way-speed-controller-2s-3s-5ax2-esc-speed-control-for-rc-vehicle-car-boat-tank-airplane-fixed-wing-drone

More to come.
